item.title: 救市成功后，中国将债务支持扩大到另一个城市
item.description: 中国监管机构批准该国东部一个负债累累的城市从银行获得资金支持，这是继最近在救助方面取得进展之后，监管机构为帮助更多地方而采取的举措。【原文：Chinese regulators gave approval to a debt-laden city in the country’s east to get funding support from banks, as they move to help more localities after making progress recently in bailouts.】

item.title: 距离大选不到一周，勒庞的极右翼势力持续上升
item.description: 根据彭博社的民意调查，玛丽娜-勒庞领导的极右翼国民自卫军在周日举行的法国第一轮临时立法选举前取得了进一步的进展，因为埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统面临着与反对党政府分享权力的可能性越来越大。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s far-right National Rally has made further gains ahead of the first round of France’s snap legislative election on Sunday, according to Bloomberg’s poll of polls, as President Emmanuel Macron faces the increasing likelihood of having to share power with an opposition government.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 Lunate 公司推出全球伊斯兰债券 ETF 以满足日益增长的需求
item.description: 总部位于阿布扎比的 Lunate Capital LLC 公司正在推出一款追踪全球伊斯兰债券的交易所交易基金，以满足该地区对稳定投资机会日益增长的需求。【原文：Abu Dhabi-based Lunate Capital LLC is launching an exchange-traded fund tracking global Islamic bonds to tap the growing demand for stable investment opportunities in the region.】

item.title: 印尼央行认为无需紧急加息以支持印尼盾
item.description: 印尼银行认为目前没有必要进一步提高利率，同时重申倾向于利用市场干预来稳定印尼盾。【原文：Bank Indonesia sees no immediate need to raise interest rates further while reiterating its preference for using market intervention to stabilize the rupiah.】

item.title: 企业权衡大选前景，富时指数有望下跌
印度高考丑闻随着刑事调查蔓延开来
item.description: 印度政府对全国医学院入学考试中的作弊和腐败指控展开了刑事调查，并解除了负责处理考试的机构负责人的职务，因为学生们对这一愈演愈烈的丑闻的抗议不断高涨。【原文：India’s government launched a criminal investigation into allegations of cheating and corruption in national entrance exams for medical colleges and removed the head of the agency in charge of handling the tests as student protests about the growing scandal continued to mount.】

item.title: 中国财政收入创一年多来最快降幅
item.description: 中国的财政收入以一年多来最快的速度缩减，这刺激了人们的预期，即中国政府可能会再次罕见地在年中修订预算，以帮助经济复苏。【原文：China’s fiscal revenue shrank at the fastest pace in more than a year, fueling expectations that the government could make another rare mid-year budget revision to aid an economic recovery.】

item.title: 新加坡核心通胀率因能源和食品成本稳定而保持不变
item.description: 由于能源和商品价格的下降抵消了服务成本的上升，新加坡上个月的核心通胀率保持不变。【原文：Singapore’s core inflation remained unchanged last month, as lower energy and goods prices offset an increase in the cost of services.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 特克斯和凯科斯群岛亿万富翁支持的气候组织发出过渡警告
item.description: 由TCI基金管理公司背后的亿万富翁基金经理克里斯-霍恩（Chris Hohn）支持的一个非营利组织表示，气候投资者要想有效实现低碳能源转型，就必须进入排放最高的行业。【原文：A nonprofit backed by Chris Hohn, the billionaire money manager behind TCI Fund Management, says climate investors need to move into the highest-emitting sectors if they’re to effectively bring about a low-carbon energy transition.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称债券多头在印度指数入市前加大押注
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的数据显示，跟踪摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Investors tracking JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s emerging markets bond index have already positioned for India’s inclusion, with 3.6% of their assets allocated to the nation’s sovereign debt at end-May, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 法国大选下注何处？意大利
item.description:
市场对马克龙竞选呼声的判断正在趋于强硬。如果巴黎的极右派或极左派引发危机，意大利的债务状况会更好。【原文：

Market judgment on Macron’s election call is hardening. Italian debt is in better shape if the far right or hard left in Paris trigger a crisis.

】

item.title: 比特币在 2024 年加密货币最糟糕的一周之后跌幅扩大
item.description: 在数字资产市场创下 2024 年以来第二大周跌幅之后，加密货币的损失正在不断增加，这反映了比特币交易所交易基金需求的降温和货币政策的不确定性。【原文：Losses are piling up in crypto after the digital-asset market’s second-worst weekly drop of 2024, a reflection of cooling demand for Bitcoin exchange-traded funds and uncertainty over monetary policy.】

item.title: 花旗银行聘请汇丰银行洪建明为香港企业银行主管
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）聘请前汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）银行家马修-洪（Matthew Hung）担任其香港企业银行业务主管。【原文：Citigroup Inc hired former HSBC Holdings Plc banker Matthew Hung to be its head of corporate banking for Hong Kong.】

item.title: 杰夫-亚斯如何成为 2024 年大选中最具影响力的亿万富翁之一
item.description:
这位将苏斯克哈纳（Susquehanna）打造成华尔街最强大交易公司之一的自由主义者与 TikTok— 扯上了关系，并将赌注押在了特朗普身上。【原文：

The libertarian who turned Susquehanna into one of Wall Street’s most powerful trading firms is enmeshed with TikTok—and betting on Trump.

】

item.title: 市场监管扩大，ICE 开始清算美国国债
item.description: 洲际交易所公司（Intercontinental Exchange Inc）是纽约证券交易所的母公司，也是市场运营商，该公司正努力成为美国国债和回购协议的中央结算中心。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange Inc., the market operator and parent of the New York Stock Exchange, is angling to become a central clearinghouse for US Treasuries and repurchase agreements — services required by new regulation for the world’s largest debt market.】

item.title: 勒庞与左翼争夺权力，法国令市场持续紧张
item.description:
选举要求选民选出新一届议会，极右翼与左翼联盟的斗争将使投资者保持警惕。【原文：

An election that asks voters to choose a new parliament will keep investors on their toes as the far right fights a leftist alliance.

】

item.title: 期权市场如何权衡法国投票和美国辩论
item.description: 就在暑假即将开始之际，法国的意外选举、英国的投票以及美国总统辩论的争议，都让政治成为交易员们关注的焦点。【原文：A surprise election in France, a UK vote and a contentious US presidential debate have brought politics to the attention of traders just as summer vacations are getting started.】

item.title: 普拉博沃编列 43 亿美元免费餐预算以维持赤字上限
item.description: 印度尼西亚当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）同意为其免费膳食计划拨款 71 万亿印尼盾（约合 43 亿美元），以缓解市场对扩张性支出的担忧。【原文：Indonesia President-elect Prabowo Subianto agreed to allocate 71 trillion rupiah ($4.3 billion) for his free meal program to allay markets’ fears of expansionary spending.】

item.title: MUFG 因客户信息泄露遭日本金融监管机构处罚
item.description: 日本金融监管机构对三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Japan’s financial regulator penalized Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.’s flagship banking unit and two joint ventures for violating client confidentiality rules, potentially dealing a further blow to their business.】

item.title: 2023 年中国吸引 23 亿美元中东主权资金
item.description: 香港金融管理局许智仁（Kenneth Hui）在周一的一次会议上表示，去年约有 23 亿美元的中东主权财富基金资金流入大中华市场。【原文：About $2.3 billion of Middle East sovereign wealth fund capital flowed into the greater China market last year, Hong Kong Monetary Authority’s Kenneth Hui said at a conference on Monday.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：监管审查逼近牛市
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 锂的持续低迷让交易商寻找复苏迹象
item.description: 锂行业的观察家们希望这种电池金属有望从史诗般的低迷中反弹，但他们发现本月价格再次下跌，库存堆积如山，而电动汽车的需求信号依然暗淡。【原文：Lithium industry watchers hoping the battery metal was poised to rebound from an epic slump have been hit by the realization prices have fallen again this month, with inventories piling up as electric vehicle demand signals stay gloomy.】

item.title: 摩根大通印度银行首席执行官辛格在任期结束前辞职
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Prabdev Singh, chief executive officer of JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s bank in India, has stepped down before the end of his term.】

item.title: Kaisa 暂时避免了清算，但需要重组计划
item.description: 香港法院给了中国开发商凯撒集团控股有限公司七个星期的时间来制定债务计划，以避免被清算，但同时也警告说，这可能是该公司最后的机会。【原文：A Hong Kong court has given Chinese developer Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd. seven more weeks to work on its debt plan in order to avoid being liquidated, but also warned this might be the company’s last chance.】

item.title: 日本央行报告摘要释放 7 月加息可能性信号，同时面临价格上行风险
item.description: 根据 6 月份政策会议的意见摘要，随着通胀上行风险变得 "更加明显"，日本央行董事会成员讨论了加息的理由。【原文：Bank of Japan board members discussed the case for an interest rate hike as upside risks to inflation become “more noticeable,” according to a summary of opinions from the June policy meeting.】

item.title: 巴西健身房连锁店 Smart Fit 确认与 Velocity 商谈入股事宜
item.description: Smartfit Escola de Ginástica e Dança SA 是拉丁美洲最大的健身连锁店之一，该公司表示正在洽谈收购控股公司 Velocity Academia de Ginástica 的股份。【原文：Smartfit Escola de Ginástica e Dança SA, one of the largest fitness chains in Latin America, said it’s in talks to acquire shares in closely held Velocity Academia de Ginástica.】

item.title: 日本贸易公司三井物产收购得克萨斯州页岩气资产
item.description: 日本贸易公司三井物产株式会社（Mitsui & Co.Ltd 收购了德克萨斯州的一处页岩气资产，并计划在 2026 年后进行全面开发。【原文：Japanese trading house Mitsui & Co. Ltd bought a shale gas asset in Texas that it seeks to bring to full-scale development after 2026.】

item.title: 印度 110 亿美元 Quant 共同基金面临监管机构调查
item.description: Quant Mutual Fund 在周日晚些时候的一份声明中表示，已收到印度股票市场监管机构的询问，并将全力配合审查。【原文：Quant Mutual Fund has received inquiries from India’s stock-market regulator and is fully committed to complying with the review, the multi-asset manager said in a statement late Sunday.】

item.title: 金色通道液化天然气承包商 Zachry 称已提出成本问题
item.description: 金色通道液化天然气出口设施的主要承包商 Zachry Holdings Inc.【原文：Zachry Holdings Inc., the lead contractor of the Golden Pass liquefied natural gas export facility, said it received assurances in 2022 and 2023 that it would be paid for its work, despite mounting costs at the massive Texas plant.】
